definitions.definition: A dissection performed on a cadaver to find possible cause(s) of death .
examples: The autopsy revealed he had died of multiple bullet wounds.

definitions.definition: An after-the-fact examination, especially of the causes of a failure.
An eyewitness observation, the presentation of an event as witnessed.

main_definition: A dissection performed on a cadaver to find possible cause(s) of death .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) An after-the-fact examination, especially of the causes of a failure.
( rare ) An eyewitness observation, the presentation of an event as witnessed.
